snippet: Mirza Teletovic, who averaged 22 points and 6 rebounds in Euroleague play last season, is said to have agreed to a three-year, $15 million contract.
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams formally committed to the Nets on Tuesday night, boosting their fortunes on and off the court as the franchise moves to Brooklyn next fall. Williams announced his decision on Twitter, sending a message at 7:03 p.m. Eastern that featured the Nets' new black-and-white logo under the words, ''Made a very tough decision today.'' He chose the Nets over the Dallas Mavericks, his hometown team, who were also aggressive in their pursuit.

headline.main: Nets Place Star Point-Guard Atop Their New Arena
